nodeList.nodeDescription:
Throws a shield at a target enemy. The shield ricochets to up to 2 additional targets before returning to you.

The cooldown starts when the shield returns to you.

nodeList.description: Shield Throw can target and ricochet to allies other than yourself. Allies are granted armor for 4 seconds when Shield Throw hits them.
nodeList.nodeDescription:
Shield can target and chain to allies.


Allies have [100] armour per point if they have been hit by Shield Throw recently.

node.description: Shield Throw has increased attack speed and ricochets to additional targets, but Shield Throw costs more mana.
node.nodeDescription:
Ricochets to up to [1] additional target per point. 

[4%] increased attack speed per point.

+[4] mana cost per point.

Throws a shield at a target enemy. The shield ricochets to up to 2 additional targets before returning to you.

The cooldown starts when the shield returns to you.

nodeList.description: {Lava Burst} deals damage in a larger area.
nodeList.nodeDescription: [30%] increased Lava Burst explosion area per point.

node.altText: Lava burst's damage scales with attunement and increases to fire damage and spell damage.
node.description: Whenever Shield Throw ricochets on an enemy it casts {Lava Burst,} a spell dealing fire damage to all enemies near the impact.
node.nodeDescription: Cast Lava Burst on ricochet at the impact point.

node.description: Shield Throw has increased attack speed and ricochets to additional targets, but Shield Throw costs more mana.
node.nodeDescription:
Ricochets to up to [1] additional target per point. 

[4%] increased attack speed per point.

+[4] mana cost per point.

Throws a shield at a target enemy. The shield ricochets to up to 2 additional targets before returning to you.

The cooldown starts when the shield returns to you.

node.description:
Shield Throw's base physical damage is converted to fire. Consequently this damage scales with increases to fire damage, but not increases to physical damage.

All increased stun chance from this tree is converted to added ignite chance.
node.nodeDescription:
All base damage is converted to fire damage.

All increased stun chance from this tree is converted to added ignite chance.

node.altText: Not affected by Shield Throw's increased effectiveness of added throwing attack damage
node.description: Shields thrown travel faster, and Shield Throw deals additional fire damage.
node.nodeDescription:
[15%] increased projectile speed

+[2] base fire damage per point.

Throws a shield at a target enemy. The shield ricochets to up to 2 additional targets before returning to you.

The cooldown starts when the shield returns to you.

stats.statName: Increased Stun Chance -> Added Ignite Chance

node.description: Shield Throw's cooldown is immediately reset when your shield returns to you, but the number of Shield Throw ricochets is halved (rounded down).
node.nodeDescription:
Halves the number of targets Shield Throw ricochets to (rounded down).

Cooldown is instantly refreshed when the shield returns to you.
